original_text: Abram stayed in the land of Canaan and he lived there. But Lot lived near the cities that were in the Jordan Valley. He put up his tents near the city of Sodom.
korean_text: 아브람은 가나안 땅에 거주하였고 롯은 그 지역의 도시들에 머무르며 그 장막을 옮겨 소돔까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: Abram stayed in the land of Canaan
But Lot lived near the cities
that were in the Jordan Valley
He put up his tents near the city of Sodom
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 소돔 성 근처에 장막을 쳤습니다
